text: Roberto Jefferson Monteiro Francisco (born June 14, 1953) is a Brazilian politician. Jefferson was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 2005. He was removed from office over multiple corruption scandals.Por 313 votos a favor e 156 contra, Câmara cassa Roberto Jefferson. UOL Notícias. September 14, 2005. Retrieved on October 14, 2007. This banned him from being elected to any public office until 2015.Q&A;: Brazil corruption scandal. BBC News. September 4, 2007. Retrieved on October 14, 2007. He was a key figure of the Mensalão scandal. His daughter is former Deputy Cristiane Brasil. He was born in Petrópolis, Brazil. He ran for President of Brazil in the 2022 election. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:People from Petrópolis
